name: If You Had One Turn (To Seize Everything)
name_original: If You Had One Turn (To Seize Everything)
description:
Hello everyone, and welcome to the 69th annual Tournament of the Chair! Come one, come all, this is something you surely don’t wanna miss! 

The Tournament can be seen as a game of Musical Chairs… but with only one chair. You have only one turn to fight off your opponents and secure your victory to fry the competition. Before you begin, one of your stats will be reduced to 1, so find different strategies to win each skirmish!

Don’t miss it, it’s fun for the whole family! We hope to see you there!
